Package pis.hue1

Class Wuerfel

java.lang.Object
pis.hue1.Wuerfel
public class Wuerfel
extends java.lang.Object
the key is the encryption key set with "setKey" Klasseninvariante: a) key != null b) key only has letters A-Z String key is set with setzeLosung or by using the constructor

  • Method Details

    • kodiere

      public java.lang.String kodiere​(java.lang.String plainText)
      encodes the Text with the Cube encryption method an encryption key has to be set first
      Parameters:
      plainText - the text that has to be encoded. The Content is irrelevant
      Returns:
      A String that encoded the text with the key that was set

    • dekodiere

      public java.lang.String dekodiere​(java.lang.String cipherText)
      decodes the Text with the Cube encryption method an encryption key has to be set first
      Parameters:
      cipherText - the encoded Text that you wish to decode
      Returns:
      the decoded text.

    • gibLosung

      public java.lang.String gibLosung()
      Returns:
      the encryption key

    • setzeLosung

      public void setzeLosung​(java.lang.String key) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      The key can only contain letters A - Z and can't be empty
      Parameters:
      key - sets encryption key
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if (key != A-Z || key.length == 0)
